prompt: Create a modern loading page with a centered circular progress indicator using Material Design 3 principles. The screen should have a clean white background with a vibrant blue circular progress indicator (0xFF2196F3) positioned at the center. Below the progress indicator, display the text 'Loading...' in a medium-sized font (18px) with a subtle gray color (0xFF666666), positioned 24 pixels below the indicator. The layout should use a Column widget within a Scaffold, vertically centered with a minimalist and professional appearance suitable for app initialization or data fetching states.
